title: Statehood
content: Himachal Pradesh became a full-fledged state on 25 January 1971.

title: Major Rivers
content: Beas, Satluj, Ravi, Chenab, and Yamuna are key rivers connected to Himachal Pradesh.

title: Famous Festivals
content: Kullu Dussehra, Minjar Fair, and Lavi Fair are major festivals of Himachal.

title: Yashwant Singh Parmar
content: Dr. Y.S. Parmar is known as the architect of modern Himachal Pradesh.
